result.reason: Hardcoded script error suppression in HTTP/HTTPS connections prevents debugging; users require a configurable setting.
result.approach: Add ScriptErrorsSuppressed property to AbstractConnectionRecord and ConnectionInfoInheritance, defaulting to true. Update HTTPBase to use this property.
